tool_description: Processes multiple schedule changes simultaneously, including provider availability updates, appointment modifications, and template applications across date ranges.

update_type.description: Type of batch update: availability_change, template_apply, mass_reschedule, provider_block

provider_ids.description: List of provider IDs affected by the update

start_date.description: Start date for the update range

end_date.description: End date for the update range

template_id.description: Template ID to apply (required for template_apply type)

block_reason.description: Reason for blocking time (required for provider_block type)

new_times.description: New appointment times for mass_reschedule type

notify_patients.description: Whether to send notifications for changes

force_update.description: Whether to force updates despite conflicts

backup_before_update.description: Whether to create backup before making changes

max_conflicts.description: Maximum number of conflicts to allow before stopping

priority_level.description: Update priority: low, normal, high, urgent

error_messages: Invalid update_type: Must be one of [availability_change, template_apply, mass_reschedule, provider_block]
Invalid date range: end_date must be after start_date and range cannot exceed 365 days
Too many providers: Maximum 100 providers per batch update
Template not found: Specified template_id does not exist (required for template_apply)
Missing block_reason: block_reason is required for provider_block update type
Invalid priority: Priority must be one of [low, normal, high, urgent]
Conflict limit exceeded: Number of conflicts exceeds max_conflicts threshold
Insufficient permissions: User lacks permission for force_update on this date range
usage: Specify update_type, provider_ids, and date range. Include additional parameters based on update_type. The tool processes all changes atomically and provides detailed results.

batch_id.description: Unique identifier for the batch update operation

total_updates.description: Total number of items processed in the batch

conflicts_detected.description: Total number of scheduling conflicts found

notifications_sent.description: Number of notifications sent to patients and providers

backup_id.description: ID of created backup if backup_before_update was enabled

processing_time.description: Time taken to complete the batch update in seconds
